pages.title: Super Lollipop
pages.text: A very delicious snacks , and i add a gold carrot to the recipe . When eating you can get a $(9)short-lived night vision$() effect.

pages.title: Iron Apple
pages.text: It doesn't look very delicious,but the positive effect is greater than negative effect.When eating you can get $(9)Heath Boost and Huste$(),Both are very useful . But you have very small chance to get $(4)Drkness or Nausea$().Because it made of iron.
